pages.text: Jwalakwe jwatite: “E mmwe Nuhu! Chisimu jwalakwe nganijuŵa jwapeŵasa penu, chisimu jwalakwe masengo (gakwe) nganigaŵa gambone, basi ngasimumbuusya Une yanganinkola nayo umanyilisi, chisimu Une ngun’jamuka kuti ntakwika mum’bele mu ŵandu ajinga.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ambuje ŵangu! Chisimu une ngulijuya Kukwenu yakum’buusya yanganingola nayo umanyilisi. Sano naga nkangululuchila ni kundendela chanasa chimbe mu ŵakwasika.”

Kwaŵechetedwe (yanti): “E mmwe Nuhu! Tulukani mwantendele wakuumila Kukwetu soni upile wejinji uŵe kukwenu ni ku mikutula ja aŵala ŵaali namwe, sano mikutula jine (jakusakala) tuchijisengwasya kaneko jichinkwaya kuumila Kukwetu ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope.”

Syalakwesi (nisine) mu abali syakusisika syatukun’juwulila, nganim’ba nkusimanya mmwejo namuno ŵandu ŵenu nkanijiŵe aji (Qur’an), basi pililani, chisimu mbesi (jambone) jili kwa ŵandu ŵawoga (wakun'jogopa Allah)

Sano kwa achina Adi (twantumisye) nnongo n’jao (jwali) Hudu. Jwalakwe jwatite: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Mun’galagatilani Allah, nganinkola ŵanganyammwe nnungu jwine jwangaŵaga Jwalakwe, nganim’ba jenumanja ikaŵeje nkusepelela unami (wakuitenda isanamu kuŵa milungu jenu).”
“E ŵandu ŵangu! Une ngangun’juga malipilo pa wele (utengau), malipilo gangu nganigaŵa kwinepe ikaŵeje kwa Ajula Jwaangumbile, ana jenumanja ŵangali lunda?”

“Soni E ŵandu ŵangu! Mum’bendani chikululuko M’mbuje gwenu soni tendani toba Kukwakwe, chantuluchisye wula mwawinji, soni chan’jonjechesye machili ku machili genu (gakala), ningasin’galauka soni kuŵa ŵakuleŵa.”

Ŵanganyao ŵatite: “E mmwe Hudu! Nganintuichilila ni chilosyo chilichose chakuonechela (chakulosya ya utume wenu), soni uwwe nganituŵa ŵakuleka milungu jetu ligongo lya maloŵe genu, soni uwwe nganituŵa tunkulupilile mmwe.”
